mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT course.course_weekday, course.course_period, (SELECT sys_dictionary.`name` FROM sys_dictionary WHERE sys_dictionary.`code`=course.course_subject_id AND type='科目') AS courseName FROM course WHERE course.course_class_id= #{n,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY course_period ,course_weekday

SELECT score.score_student_id, score.score_year, score.score_achievement, score.score_bathch, (SELECT sys_dictionary.`name` FROM sys_dictionary WHERE sys_dictionary.`code`= score.score_subject_id AND type='科目') AS subject_name, (SELECT sys_dictionary.`name` FROM sys_dictionary WHERE sys_dictionary.`code`=score.score_semester AND type='考试') AS score_semester, (SELECT sys_dictionary.`name` FROM sys_dictionary WHERE sys_dictionary.`code`=score.score_status AND type='学生状态') AS score_status FROM score WHERE score_student_id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT student_id, student_name, student_birthday, student_address, (SELECT class_info.class_name FROM class_info WHERE class_info.id = a.student_class_id ) AS student_class, (SELECT sys_dictionary.`name` FROM sys_dictionary WHERE sys_dictionary.`code` = a.student_sex AND type = '性别') AS student_sex, (SELECT sys_dictionary.`name` FROM sys_dictionary WHERE sys_dictionary.`code`=a.student_status AND type = '学生状态' )AS student_status, (SELECT sys_dictionary.`name` FROM sys_dictionary WHERE sys_dictionary.`code`=a.student_nationality AND type='民族') AS student_nationality, (SELECT sys_dictionary.`name` FROM sys_dictionary WHERE sys_dictionary.`code`=a.student_political_status AND type='政治面貌') AS student_political_status FROM student AS a WHERE student_name=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
